label: 末法
対訳語: The Decline of the Law, the Latter Days of the Law
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: saddharmavipralopa. The final, degenerative period of the Buddhist teaching during which time both the practice and attainment of the Dharma (hō, q. v.) will be forgotten. See sanji entry. [三時、法]
